Package stocker.controller.inputoutput

Class NetworkClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocker.controller.inputoutput.Serializer
      • stocker.controller.inputoutput.NetworkClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatabaseController
    public abstract class NetworkClient
extends Serializer
    The abstract class NetworkClient is an extension of the class DatabaseController and organizes the connection to a server as well as the sending and receiving of various requests. It contains the two classes PushClient and PullClient and extends the helper class Serializer.
    Author:
    Christoph Kaplan
